name: Super Easy Homemade Cheesy Spaghetti O's
ingredients: 2 tablespoons salted butter 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil 3 cloves garlic, chopped 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano chili flakes1/3 cup tomato paste 2 cups Anellini or other small pastakosher salt and black pepper1 teaspoon onion powder 1/2 teaspoon paprika 1 cup grated parmesan cheese 1/2 cup grated pecorino cheese 1/2 cup fresh basil
method: 1. Melt together the butter, olive oil, garlic, oregano, and chili flakes in a large pot over medium heat. Cook until the butter turns golden, about 5 minutes. 2. Reduce the heat to low, stir in the tomato paste. Cook 1-2 minutes, then pour over 3 cups of water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Add the pasta, onion powder, paprika, and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, about 12 minutes.3. Stir in the parmesan, pecorino, and basil until the cheese is melted. 4. Serve immediately topped with fresh basil. Eat!
